name: Lemonade Stand (kanbei04)
description:
Hi! Welcome to Lemonsville!

It's Summertime and the Living's Easy...

Grab a cold glass, sit back and enjoy the simple pleasures of this classic Apple II business simulation from 1979.

This port is based on the original game code found here:
https://github.com/lars-erik/lemonade-stand

Please submit any comments, feedback or bug reports below.
